game.name: Dragon Fire and Fury
game.description:
This time you would spot Dragon and fun together! Are you ready to try out your hands in a tricky arcade challenge? Join Dragon: Fire and Fury and be prepared to control a powerful dragon and defend your precious treasure! Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to combine match 3 or more items together to reward you with the attack or a special power.  This lovely puzzle challenge combines awesome match 3 gameplay together with the elements of tower defense.

Your successful attempts in the game will allow you to play as the dragon in the cave. Be careful and try to apply your magic to ward off the attackers in this html5 strategy game! Make sure to keep your gold and other treasure away from the king and his cruel army. Avoid being scared and try to destroy all the obstacles that come on the way of the dragon! Common friends! You have the guts to unleash the powerful attacks to stand strong against a horde of marching warriors from the human kingdom.

This greedy king is very selfish and wants all the gems from her nearby caves. You are a dragon and protecting these games for a long. Keep clearing the multiple same objects to get the advantage of performing dangerous combos and devastating attacks in this action-packed puzzle game! Try to remove as many tiles as you can to improve the power of your dragon! More enemies will start appearing and the grid becomes larger as you move to the advanced level. Let us see if you are skilled enough to defend your treasure from the greedy king!
